NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Travel and Adoption or the cell corresponding to Travel and Globalization?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Travel} and {Adoption} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Social Media and Globalization or the cell corresponding to Travel and Globalization?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Social Media} and {Globalization} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Cuisine and Globalization or the cell corresponding to Language and Localization?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Cuisine} and {Globalization} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.68 to 0.97?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Art, Adoption), (Movies, Adoption), (Travel, Commercialization), (Cuisine, Critique), (Travel, Critique), (Art, Globalization), (Social Media, Globalization), (Social Media, Influence), (Art, Innovation), (Fashion, Innovation), (Cuisine, Localization), (TV Shows, Localization), (Travel, Localization), (Cuisine, Popularity), (Language, Popularity), (Movies, Popularity), (Social Media, Popularity)}.
